name: Ethan Moritz Two Prototypes
description:
Meteor Dodge

The first game is a curtain dodging game where you click to teleport your planet trying to dodge the evil stars trying to destroy your moon.

Line-Up

The second is a proof of concept to try and get the simple mechanics for a game working. The premise is that you use clues that are given to you to shoot someone in the scene. However this was never implemented.
